meanings.sent1: The ants were very industrious, always busy collecting food for the winter.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being an industrious student, always completing her assignments on time.
meanings.sent3: The industrious squirrel gathered nuts all day, never taking a break.
meanings.sent4: The industrious bee buzzed from flower to flower, pollinating as it worked.
meanings.sent5: His industrious nature shone through as he tackled each task with determination.

meanings.definition: Characterized by hard work and perseverance.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers were an industrious group, never stopping until the job was done.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their industrious efforts and refusal to give up.
meanings.sent3: The industrious little boy tried to build a tower of blocks taller than himself.
meanings.sent4: The garden flourished under the care of the industrious gardener, blooming with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Her industrious spirit inspired those around her to work harder and achieve their goals.
